data.text:
Contact the City

City Hall

130 N Second Street

P.O. Box 236

Toledo, Washington 98591

Phone: 360-864-4564

cityoftoledo@toledotel.com

Office Hours:

Mon – Thur 9:00 to 3:00

Friday 9:00 to 12:00

Police Office

130 N Second Street

P.O. Box 517

Toledo, Washington 98591

Phone: 360-864-6041 (voicemail only)

toledopolice@toledotel.com

Non-emergency Central Dispatch: 360-740-1105

Emergencies call 9-1-1.

MORE INFO

Public Works

1000 S 5th Street

P.O. Box 236

Toledo, Washington 98591

Phone: 360-864-4564

wwtp@toledotel.com

Fire Department

150 N Second Street

P.O. Box 309

Toledo, Washington 98591

Phone: 360-864-2366 (business only)

Email: admin@toledofire.org

Website: toledofire.org

Non-emergency situations, call Central Dispatch: 360-740-1105

For any emergency dial 9-1-1
